sen.j: 中村 児太郎（なかむら こたろう）は歌舞伎の名跡の一。
sen.e: "Kotaro NAKAMURA" is one of professional names used by Kabuki (a Japanese traditional form of drama and music performed by male actors) actors.
"Kotaro NAKAMURA" is a professional name used by Kabuki (a Japanese traditional form of drama and music performed by male actors) actors.
sen.cmt: one of professional names→a professional nameとしました。
sen.e: "Kotaro NAKAMURA" is a professional name used by Kabuki (a Japanese traditional form of drama and music performed by male actors) actors.

sen.j: 現在では中村福助の前に襲名、中村芝翫か中村歌右衛門を嗣ぐべき役者の初名とすることが多い。
sen.e: Nowadays this name is often used before Fukusuke NAKAMURA as the first Kabuki actor professional name by actors who will eventually succeed to the name of Shikan NAKAMURA or the name of Utaemon NAKAMURA.
Nowadays this name is often used before Fukusuke NAKAMURA as the first professional name of Kabuki actors who will eventually succeed to the name of Shikan NAKAMURA or the name of Utaemon NAKAMURA.
sen.cmt: as the first Kabuki actor professional name by actors→as the first professional name of Kabuki actorsとしました。
sen.e: Nowadays this name is often used before Fukusuke NAKAMURA as the first professional name of Kabuki actors who will eventually succeed to the name of Shikan NAKAMURA or the name of Utaemon NAKAMURA.
The current Kotaro is the sixth generation.
The current Kotaro is the sixth generation.
The current Kotaro is the sixth generation.
The yago (stage family name) used by Kotaro NAKAMURA is Narikoma-ya.
The yago (stage family name) used by Kotaro NAKAMURA is Narikoma-ya.

Their jomon (emblems of a Kabuki family) are called Gionmori and Ura-ume.

Their jomon (emblems of a Kabuki family) are called Gionmori and Ura-ume.

sen.j: 初代中村児太郎 中村芝翫 (4代目)の養子。
sen.e: Kotaro NAKAMURA the First was an adopted son of Shikan NAKAMURA the Fourth.
Kotaro NAKAMURA the First was an adopted son of Shikan NAKAMURA the Fourth.
Kotaro NAKAMURA the First was an adopted son of Shikan NAKAMURA the Fourth.

sen.j: 後の中村歌右衛門 (5代目)。
sen.e: He later became Utaemon NAKAMURA the Fifth.

He later became Utaemon NAKAMURA the Fifth.

sen.j: 2代目中村児太郎 初代の長男。
sen.e: Kotaro NAKAMURA the Second was the eldest son of the first generation.

sen.j: 3代目中村児太郎 初代の次男（実は2代目の実子）。
sen.e: Kotaro NAKAMURA the Third was the second son of the first generation (but he was in fact a biological son of the second generation).

sen.j: 4代目中村児太郎 2代目の長男。
sen.e: Kotaro NAKAMURA the Fourth is the eldest son of the second generation.
